pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Undo translate, rotate, snap and align

content.raw:
I think Louise and I are scheduled to further discuss this in the afternoon. I looked at Illustrator, and Undo works even when a change was made in their version of an Inspector. It seems like a good idea to let users Undo what they did even after the Inspector is closed. 

What are the challenges/down-sides of this?
